name: Limen
description:
Limén (Greek) 

i. Harbor ii. (figurative) A haven, retreat, refuge

A singleplayer TTRPG that does not require a table.  Based on the myth of Orpheus and Eurydice, Limén focuses in on the internal (after)life of Eurydice. 

As Eurydice, you take your path into your own hands, creating narratives and uncovering secrets of your past life,  your new life, and the Underworld.
